callable by the unregisterKey-accountonly callable in the 1st year after deployment","params":{"_signer":"the signer-address of the in3-node"}},"requestUnregisteringNode(address)":{"details":"reverts when the provided address is not an in3-signerreverts when the node is already unregisteringreverts when inactivity is claimedif not the node owner reverts when the send deposit it not correctreverts when being the owner and sending value through this function","params":{"_signer":"the signer of the in3-node"}},"returnDeposit(address)":{"details":"reverts when not the owner of the former in3-nodereverts when there is nothing to transferreverts if the deposit is still locked","params":{"_signer":"the signer-address of a former in3-node"}},"revealConvict(address,bytes32,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32)":{"details":"reverts if a block with that number cannot be found in either the latest 256 blocks or the blockhash registryreverts when tryin to convict someone with a correct blockhashreverts when trying to reveal immediately after calling convictreverts when the _signer did not sign the blockreverts when the wrong convict hash (see convict-function) is used","params":{"_blockNumber":"number of the wrongly provided blockhash","_blockhash":"the wrongly provided blockhash","_r":"r of the signature","_s":"s of the signature","_signer":"the address that signed the wrong blockhash","_v":"v of the signature"}},"totalNodes()":{"return":"the number of total in3-nodes"},"transferOwnership(address,address)":{"details":"reverts when trying to change ownership of an inactive nodereverts when trying to pass ownership to 0x0reverts when the sender is not the current ownerreverts when inacitivity is claimed","params":{"_newOwner":"the new owner","_signer":"the signer-address of the in3-node, used as an identifier"}},"updateNode(address,string,uint64,uint64,uint64)":{"details":"reverts when the sender is not the owner of the nodereverts when the signer does not own a nodereverts when trying to increase the timeout above 10 yearsreverts when trying to change the url to an already existing one","params":{"_props":"the new properties, will be changed if different from the current onec","_signer":"the signer-address of the in3-node, used as an identifier","_timeout":"the new timeout of the node, cannot be decreased","_url":"the url, will be changed if different from the current one","_weight":"the amount of requests per second the node is able to handle"}}},"title":"Registry for owner"},"registerNodeFor(string,uint64,uint64,address,uint64,uint8,bytes32,bytes32)":{"notice":"register a new node as a owner using a different signer address"},"removeNodeFromRegistry(address)":{"notice":"removes an in3-server from the registry"},"requestUnregisteringNode(address)":{"notice":"a node owner can request to unregister his nodebut before he can confirm, he has to wait for his own-set deposit timeoutcan also be called by a non owner, challenging the in3-node to prove that he is activein order to do so, a challenger has to stake an amount equal to 2% of the node's deposit"},"returnDeposit(address)":{"notice":"returns the deposit after a node has been removed due to inactivityonly callable after the timeout of the deposit is over"},"revealConvict(address,bytes32,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32)":{"notice":"reveals the wrongly provided blockhash, so that the node-owner will lose its deposit"},"totalNodes()":{"notice":"length of the nodelist"},"transferOwnership(address,address)":{"notice":"changes the ownership of an in3-node"},"updateNode(address,string,uint64,uint64,uint64)":{"notice":"updates a node by adding the
